transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir bataye.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Ji ji IndiaMART se kar rahe ho sir bataye. 
Customer: Sir IndiaMART se kar rahe ho sir, mera koi kaam kum dilwa do yaar, koi paise pure karwa do please dekh ke.
Executive: Sir lead to aa rahi hai aapke paas.
Customer: Na koi lead aayi hai na koi call aayi hai, na koi inquiry aayi hai.
Executive: Nahi ye wo to aayi hai aapke paas lead to aayi hai sir.
Customer: Yaar khai kaha maine ye dekho.
Executive: Short blasting rubber belt ki abhi aayi thi 7 ghante pehle aapne consume nahi kari hai?
Customer: Kaha aayi hai?
Executive: Aap past lead mein jaake check karo, thoda active raho, koi ladka wadka laga do sir, mai to keh raha hu ek staff rakh lo, lead dekhta rahega.
Aap thoda active kam reh pa rahe ho.
Customer: Kaha aayi hai yaar, kaha hai?
Customer: Mai phone mein check kar raha hu abhi live bhi. 
Executive: Aap past lead mein jao.
Customer: Kis mein jau?
Customer: Past lead matlab phone pe dekh rahe ho?
Customer: Phone pe India India wale page to bhi chala gaya.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi usme mat dekho, past lead matlab jo aap consume nahi kar paaye wo wali lead ki baat kar raha hu, sold out wali. Abhi aayi hai, aaj hi ke din pe 4-5 aayi hai sir.
Customer: Wo nahi bhai hai yaar, aavi hawa mein mat maro, mai jhoot nahi bolta ekdum bhi.
Executive: Hawa mein nahi mar raha hu, hawa mein nahi mar raha hu. Aap ek kaam karo ID par pe kholi aapne?
Customer: Haan haan Jio hai waha pe.
Executive: Me dekho jaha pe India India usi wali line pe aage dekho. Arrow bana hoga ek arrow, teer sa.
Customer: [inaudible] yaar aavi na bas yaar ye kaha arrow bana hai.
Executive: Arrow bana hua hai.
Customer: Save other export category kithe hai na dasso.
Executive: Haan usko us taraf hi dekhiye ek bana hoga.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ruk jao mai aapko karo.
Customer: [inaudible] nahi hai yaar diye aavi [unintelligible].
Executive: Are nahi aisa nahi sir dekho mai aapko [unintelligible].
Customer: [inaudible] hawa hawa mein mari ja rahe ho.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi mai aapko screenshot deta hu ruk jao.
Customer: Hawa hi hai hawa hai hawa.
Executive: Mai aapko screenshot de raha hu sir hawa kis cheez ki screenshot de raha hu mai.
Customer: Mai mai bhi screenshot daal du aapko phir?
Customer: Mai chalo aap aao online online aao ab mai dikhata hu aapko lead.
Customer: Online kya aau mai yaar abhi kaam kar raha hu mai.
Customer: Phone pe dekh sakta hu mai haath mein phone hai.
Executive: [unintelligible] kholunga sir.
Customer: Mai bhi aapko screenshot dalunga na whatsapp pe phir.
Executive: Wo aap wo wala dikha rahe hoge mere ko jo active by lead, active by lead mein nahi keh raha hu mai, past leads ki baat kar raha hu jo aapko chhut dengi abhi. Dekho ek short blasting rubber belt ki dekho ek 30-30 ki nozzle kya rakhhi dekho mai aur bhi dikhata hu.
Customer: [inaudible] sir na karo yaar, na tang karo.
Customer: Kaam dilwao agar dilwana hai to.
Customer: Wo aap working nahi kar rahe ho mere catalog pe na acting nahi hai, pata hai kya hai?
Executive: Sir working kar raha hu.
Customer: Maine double paisa kharch liya aapke chalte, IndiaMART ke mai socha ki IndiaMART ki team ki shayad galti ho sakti hai kahi, technical issue ho sakta hai.
Customer: Par lekin technical issue nahi hai aapke portal pe kaam hi nahi hai mere ko lag raha hai.
Executive: Nahi sir kaam nahi hota to itne thodi na rehte kaam to hai is time pe aapko inquiry mein kya karu.
Customer: Inquiry lead aa rahi hai mai keh raha hu sir aapko staff lead pata koi banda wanda hire kar sakte ho aap koi banda baitha rahe pure din portal pe.
Customer: Aapke dekho jitne bhi competitor unhone staff baitha rakha hai wo sab ek banda pura din by lead pe laga rakha hai un logo ne.
Customer: To baitha rehta wo by lead jaisi aati hai wo turant hi consume karta hai.
Customer: Kaun hai batao.
Executive: Bahut hai dekho jitne bhi [unintelligible].
Customer: O yaar bas karo yaar, nahi hai kuch bhi nahi hai.
Customer: [unintelligible] kitne dene aa?
Executive: Bhai ye GS scanner sir wali baar aa raha hai kuch.
Customer: O yaar kisi pe bhi nahi aa raha na, maine isliye to us pe paisa kharab kar liya, mere ko to load hi nahi hai us pe paisa lagane ki, maine check kiya.
Executive: Wahi mai keh raha hu aap us pe laga ke galat usi wali ID pe [unintelligible] tha aapko.
Customer: Ideal blasting industry isko dekho zara call aaya hai koi.
Customer: O sir kuch nahi hai, jo mai aap bata raha hu meri baat suno, maine jo dusre pe renewal karwaya hai na, wo maine isliye karwaya tha ho sakta hai ki mai kyuki logo ko kaam mil raha hai mere ko kyu nahi mil raha.
Executive: Ye aisa nahi hota aap 10 companiya khol lo agar same product.
Customer: Agar mai dekho chalane wala mai hi dono company mai chala raha hu mai pagal thoda na hu, maine kaha socha ki logo ko kaam mil raha hai IndiaMART se shayad mere catalog mein kami ho.
Executive: [inaudible] mai wahi keh raha hu yaar mai.
Customer: Aap bhi meri baat suno aap meri baat sabko sunte ho samajhte ho, matlab lekin kaam nahi ho raha active.
Executive: Mai wahi keh raha hu.
Customer: Logo ko naam nahi dikhta mera. GS scanner wala jo, acha ye batao wo kisne aapko rai di thi uski maine do ID khol lo to business mil jayega.
Customer: O yaar rai nahi di thi dimag humne lagaya tha shayad hamare catalog aap sahi nahi ho pa raha.
Executive: Isi wale mein isi wale mein agar aapke matlab jitna paisa usme diya isi service mein thoda lead ka package chala.
Customer: Wo to abhi nahi chalani dono nahi chalani yaar, meri baat suno dono nahi chalani maine koshish last mauka diya tha IndiaMART ko. Wo pata hai kya baat hai baar baar paisa kharab karna aukha hai mere liye bhi na, koi ek rupay ki wapsi nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Wapsi nahi hai matlab isme ab.
Executive: Mai aapko ek baat mano meri mere kehne se agar koi banda agar hafte bhar mein daal ke dekh lo, hafte bhar ek bande ko baithao usko mai training de dunga.
Customer: O yaar mai kya koi kaam karta [unintelligible] aadha ghante baitha rahe.
Customer: Mai vehla baithta hu bhaiya mai vehla baithta hu mai.
Customer: Mai koi kaam nahi karta. Lead chhut kaise rahi hai lead chhut kaise rahi hai?
Customer: Aa hi aa hi nahi rahi na mere ko yahi to baat hai, na aapka message aata hai IndiaMART se bhi ghanto trade India se message aata hai.
Executive: Aap online baithe raha karo us time mai wahi to keh raha hu online rahoge tabhi dikhegi lead.
Customer: Oye hoye aapke phir aapke catalog mein aapke catalog mein ye system nahi hai ki message aaye ya kuch aaye lead aaye to message aana chahiye phone pe.
Executive: Ye batao mere ko aapne last business kab kiya?
Customer: Aap aisa karo aap kya ho sakta hai kahi aapko dikkat ho gayi aapke senior hai meri baat karwao.
Executive: Nahi nahi senior hai mai aapko puchna cha raha hu ki ye aap mere ko ye baat karwao aap aaj aaj baat hi karwao aaj meri aaye chhodo yaar.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji namaskar sir ji.
Executive: Namaskar ji sir. Ji batao sir kaise ho.
Customer: Sir theek hai, sir ek help chahiye agar ho sakti hai to kar do yaar kaam kum nahi mil raha na lead hai na inquiry hai.
Executive: Sir hamara aap.
Customer: Maine pata hai kya hai IndiaMART pe do jagah pe paid portal khol liya, us pe bhi koi fayda nahi hua dono pe fail hi ho raha hai meri taraf se, jo mere liye logo ne dikhaya ki IndiaMART pe kaam hai mere ko koi fayda nahi ho raha. Na us pe kaam aa raha na is pe kaam aa raha zero response hai yaar.
Executive: Aap us pe aao ek baar meeting pe join karo mai dekhta hu is baar dobara. 
Customer: Yaar meeting mein bhi kar lega ghanta aadha ghanta madam ke sath matlab kiya kuch bhi nahi hai, meeting mein aap karoge kya meeting mein meeting mein wo hi cheez aati hai bas aap aise isko kholo catalog check karo ye view check karo ji aapki inquiry nahi hai ji call nahi hai kya hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi mai ye dekhunga ki aapke product line mein kitni by lead generate hui hai, aapke paas kitni aayi hai aapke paas call nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Bhejo bhejo Google mein bhejo bhejo link bhejo.
Executive: Check karo maine bheja hai aapko join karo usme. Mai aapko call cut kar raha hu okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough leads or inquiries.

- Feels IndiaMART is not working.

- Wasted money on paid portals without benefit.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to join a meeting.

- Executive will check product line and lead generation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive sent a meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, meeting, renewal
